service.name: Hosts
service.description: The static table lookup for host names

c:simple-property.name: lenses-path
c:simple-property.description: Full path to the augeas lenses directory. Example: /usr/local/share/augeas/lenses

c:simple-property.name: root-path
c:simple-property.description: Path from which augeas should begin to search for configuration files. Example: /

c:simple-property.name: augeas-hosts-path
c:simple-property.description: Augeas tree location of the hosts configuration values.

c:simple-property.name: ipAddress
c:simple-property.description: The IP address of the host entry. The address may be an IPv4 address (e.g., 192.168.1.10) or an IPv6 address (e.g., fec0:0:0:bebe::2).

c:simple-property.name: canonicalName
c:simple-property.description: The canonical host name to refer to the IP address. Host names may contain only alphanumeric characters, minus signs ('-'), and periods ('.'). They must begin with an alphabetic character and end with an alphanumeric character. (e.g., foo.mydomain.org)

c:simple-property.name: aliases
c:simple-property.description: Optional aliases provide for name changes, alternate spellings, shorter host names, or generic host names (e.g., localhost); aliases should be newline or space separated).
